author: cnbc.com
title: Semtech: Fiscal 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
CAMARILLO, Calif. (AP) _ Semtech Corp. (SMTC) on Wednesday reported fiscal first-quarter net income of $12.4 million.
On a per-share basis, the Camarillo, California-based company said it had profit of 18 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 47 cents per share.
The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 46 cents per share.
The chipmaker posted revenue of $130.4 million in the period, which missed Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $150.4 million.
For the current quarter ending in August, Semtech expects its per-share earnings to range from 50 cents to 58 cents.
The company said it expects revenue in the range of $155 million to $167 million for the fiscal second quarter.
Semtech shares have increased 32 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $45.30, a climb of 22 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on SMTC at https://www.zacks.com/ap/SMTC
